nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex

Class ForwardIndexImplSeparate

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex.ForwardIndexImplSeparate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<AnnotationForwardIndex>, ForwardIndex

    public class ForwardIndexImplSeparate
extends Object
implements ForwardIndex
    Multi-forward index implemented by combining several separate annotation forward indexes.

        public void addDocument(Map<Annotation,List<String>> content,
                        Map<Annotation,List<Integer>> posIncr,
                        org.apache.lucene.document.Document document)
        Description copied from interface: ForwardIndex
        Store the given content and assign an id to it. Note that if more than one token occurs at any position, we only store the first in the forward index.
        Specified by:
        addDocument in interface ForwardIndex
        Parameters:
        content - the content to store
        posIncr - the associated position increments, or null if position increment is always 1.
        document - Lucene document
